Mr Andy Coulson , who joined the Prime Minister, David Cameron , as his Director of Communications after last year's election, quit overnight unexpectedly conceding that his involvement in the affair made it difficult to give the 110 per cent needed in the job. His departure sent shockwaves around Westminister and came just hours after the sudden resignation of one of Labour's most senior MPs, the shadow Chancellor, Alan Johnson , who stepped down on
